TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː s k oʊ l s t ɛ l l ɐ æ s k h ɚ t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oʊ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p z f aɪ v t ɪ k s l æ b z ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b i æ z n ɛ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ r b ɑː b w iː oʊ l z oʊ n iː d ɐ s m oʊ l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b iː t ɔø k t oʊ f ɹ r ɔ ɡ f oʊ r ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b ɛ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ r w ɛ n z d eɪ æ ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
